reviews.title: Good Enough

reviews.text: Yes, there were Stag and Hen parties galore! Heard a bit of noise, but not too bad. (Why dont they assign a whole floor to these parties??)
reviews.title: not good enough

aka: Ibis Liverpool City Centre Hotel Liverpool
description: The ibis Liverpool Centre Albert Dock Hotel is located 5 km from the airport and a 10 min walk from the city centre. With pubs, theatres, historic buildings, nightspots and the Everton FC and Liverpool FC stadia all within the immediate vicinity, the hotel is ideal for weekends as well as longer business or holiday stays. Offers 127 rooms including 5 for guests with limited mobility, a restaurant, a bar offering snacks 24hrs and secure outdoor parking. Business guests will appreciate use of WiFi Internet.
